Blog - page 80

  1. 54/365: SAVE OUR YOUTH CENTREZ

    26.02.2011

    I use the Notes app on my iPhone to keep ideas of things I might want to photograph, just in case I don't see anything - or I'm too busy to go out looking - on any particular day. It's a win for me if I manage to get through any day without using one of those ideas. This was one such day.

    Tags:

  3. 52/365

    24.02.2011

    We found this frog in the garden on Monday night. It's quite resilliant, having survived being stepped on by Steph (it hopped under her foot just as she was stepping over it).

    I love the colours in this photo, achieved by shining a torch as it hid in a corner, recovering from the foot.

    Tags:

  5. 50/365: Josie

    This is Darren and Emma's labradoodle, Josie. She's great; so much fun.

    I think I'm completely over my fear of dogs now.
